predicate.note: Frames file for 'trap' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to catch in or as if in a trap

example.name: non-agentive
example.text: Now , some see Mr. Bush trapped in a position [0] he is neither comfortable with [*T*-1] nor able [*-2] to escape [*T*-1] .
example.arg: a position [0] he is neither comfortable with [*T*-1] nor able [*-2] to escape [*T*-1]

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Weisman predicts [0] stocks will appear [*-1] to stabilize in the next few days before [*-1] declining again , [*-2] trapping more investors .
